name: Why the Raccoon has marks on his face
name_original: Why the Raccoon has marks on his face
description:
Cultural Stories in Oculus Quest/Oculus Quest2

This is a special project to bring a Native Story of the Lenape Tribe into virtual reality for FREE for everyone to listen and enjoy the indigenous cultural stories. You can find more information about the project and the stories  below.

https://www.learnrollimmerse.com/story-of-the-tribe-special-showcase-project/

You can read more about the tribe here

http://delawaretribe.org/

This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License

The project is FREE and stories are copyrighted and preserved by the Delaware Indian Tribe. 

This application can only be used with Oculus Quest/Oculus Quest 2  VR Device currently.
